plot: David Alfaro Siqueiros painted one of his best murals inside a basement. It was abandoned until somebody tried to sell it after mutilated it into five enormous pieces.
title: Ejercicio Plastico
plot_es: David Alfaro Siqueiros painted one of his best murals inside a basement. It was abandoned until somebody tried to sell it after mutilated it into five enormous pieces.

produce.name: Consejo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes (CONACULTA)
